## TileFactory class

Templated factory class to create instances of \[\[Tile\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class TileFactory<TileType extends Tile> 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(m\_modelConstructor)](./harp-mapview-decoder.tilefactory._constructor_.md) |  | Initialize the factory using the constructor of the element to be called when a \[\[Tile\]\] is created. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [create(dataSource, tileKey)](./harp-mapview-decoder.tilefactory.create.md) |  | Create an instance of (subclass of) \[\[Tile\]\]. The required parameters are passed as arguments to the constructor of \[\[Tile\]\]. |
